raw_text: Should features be selected on the basis of a statistical test? 4Purandare and Pedersen (2004) used a log likelihood test to select their features, prob ably because of the intuition that? candidate words whose occurrence depends on whether the ambiguous word occurs will be indicative of one of the senses of the ambiguous word and hence useful for disambiguation? clean_text: Purandare and Pedersen (2004) used a log likelihood test to select their features, probably because of the intuition that candidate words whose occurrence depends on whether the ambiguous word occurs will be indicative of one of the senses of the ambiguous word and hence useful for disambiguation (Schutze, 1998 ,p.102).
